name: GOA Tech Demo #2
description:
WASD to move the little tank

R to respawn

Left and right arrows to look left and right

Escape to close the game

Space to activate Sandevistan (only in secret ending)

The Goal:

Get to the heavenly glowing spot

OR

Talk to the special Yoshikage Kira (the one with the floaty thing behind him)

You choose...
